float.description: A shade lighter than the default background for elements that float above the default background, eg. modals, popovers.

dip.description: A shade darker than the default background for elements that are below the default background, eg. read only card, info section.

contrast.description: For text and icons on full screen background eg. body text, icons, button text.

dim.description: For deemphasized text and icons on full screen background eg. time stamps.

emphasized.description: For emphasized text and icons on full screen background eg. links, ids.

emphasized-hover.description: A shade lighter than emphasized for hovering interactive text and icons eg. links, ids.

match-background.description: To use on backgrounds contrasting the default background eg. button text on a blue button.

white.description: Plain white for going as bright as you can.

black.description: Plain black, for going as dark as you can.

primary.description: To use for the most important action on the page eg. CTA link

success.description: To signify success or open eg. issues.

primary-fade.description: Fades from primary to a darker shade for graph lines.

red.description: To signify error eg. text field hints.
